users.views module¶

class users.views.LoginView(**kwargs)¶

Bases: ObtainAuthToken

A view for handling user authentication and providing a token upon successful login.

This view extends the ObtainAuthToken and overrides the post method to validate the user credentials and return an authentication token, user ID, and email address.

post(request, *args, **kwargs)¶
